text: many organizations are moving to AWS to
accelerate workloads such as machine
learning analytics genomics video
processing financial modeling and
electronic design automation to fully
harness the power of these data hungry
applications businesses need fast
scalable and shared access to data
introducing Amazon FS x4 lustre FS x4
lustre is a high-performance shared file
storage on AWS that works natively with
Amazon s3 FS x4 lustre provides fast
data access that skills with your needs
whether you want to process sensor data
from autonomous vehicles run genomics
applications for gene sequencing or
bioimaging accelerate semiconductor
design with electronic design automation
workloads or quickly process edit and
render ultra high-resolution digital
content Amazon FS x4 lustre makes it
easier for you to run high-performance
computing workloads on AWS and extract
maximum value from your data with FS x
for luster you can access your data
securely with sub-millisecond latency x'
and read and write at speeds of up to
hundreds of gigabytes per second and
millions of IEEE ops Amazon FS X makes
it easy for you to process your data
sets stored in long-term cloud data
stores like Amazon s3 you can also use
FS x4 lustre as a standalone
high-performance file system to burst
your workloads from on-premises to the
cloud FS exper luster provides fast and
low-cost file storage to process data on
s3 and on premises learn more at
aws.amazon.com /f sx / lustre
